name: revit.create_wall
description: Creates a wall in the active Revit document between two points with a specified height and optional wall type.

start_point.description: Start point [X, Y, Z] in feet

end_point.description: End point [X, Y, Z] in feet

wall_type.description: Name of the wall type to use. If omitted, uses the default wall type.

level_name.description: Name of the level to place the wall on. If omitted, uses the active level.

examples.description: Create a 10-foot high wall along the X axis
Create a wall with a specific type
